originalText.text: I stayed with them for a year. It's been a great experience. They have all the in-house amenities bed sheets and also thoughfully give you mongthly essentials like kitchen towels and toilet paper, in case you need them. Shout out to my friendly manager Yana, who always made sure everything was running smoothly. The monthly room clenaing is fantastic

originalText.text: The place has an amazing location as well as a very professional team that makes the overall process efficient, clear and welcoming. Yana is a valuable member of the team. She is always there to help, resolve and assist; making the stay a better one.

text.text: The place has an amazing location as well as a very professional team that makes the overall process efficient, clear and welcoming. Yana is a valuable member of the team. She is always there to help, resolve and assist; making the stay a better one.

originalText.text: Yana was the best property manager I could’ve asked for and absolutely exceeded expectations. She was always there quickly when I needed anything and was a very kind person to be around. All around amazing person and apartment building!

text.text: Yana was the best property manager I could’ve asked for and absolutely exceeded expectations. She was always there quickly when I needed anything and was a very kind person to be around. All around amazing person and apartment building!

originalText.text: I loved my experience with Heritage apartments!! I am an international student and stayed in new york and it was a great experience - I felt at home immediately, the apartment was very clean and high quality, and I had no issues. The managers of heritage are also so responsive and nice and will help you get settled completely - I owe a big thanks to the property manager, Yana, for making my stay so comfortable. thank you!!

originalText.text: My experience absolutely exceeded expectations! The apartment was renovated and spacious, but most importantly the building manager Yana was always available to assist in anything we could possibly have needed at any time (day or night). Overall great experience
